note:
Neurodivergent (waiting for assessment). Linux user. Left-Libertarian. Pantheistic Omnist. Aromantic asexual. Non-League football and rugby league supporter. Amateur radio licence holder. Japanophile and otaku!

I'm also an Ealing Commoner, with family links to Sheffield, who now lives in Somerset, via a few years in Germany.

This is my personal account. Please see https://mastodon.tjs.is/@toran for toots relating to my professional and academic areas of interest!
